headline: Why Hershey (HSY) is Poised to Beat Earnings Estimates Again
summary: Hershey (HSY) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: 3 Cash-Producing Stocks Facing Headwinds
summary: A company that generates cash isn’t automatically a winner. Some businesses stockpile cash but fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their ability to expand.
